snippet.title: Let's Play Disgaea Trailer (SPOILERS)
snippet.description:
WARNING: This trailer may contain EXTREME spoilers, though they probably wouldn't make sense to anyone who hasn't played the game before.

This is my tech demo for Disgaea: Afternoon of Darkness, which took me five hours to put together.  I will probably make a preview episode before starting the actual LP, to address any questions that you might have.  If you do, please let me know in the comments section below.  I plan to start the LP some time this week.

The BGM to the latter half of the trailer is called "The Master" from Code Geass.

Thanks for watching!
